description: Negative self-perception refers to an individualâ€™s belief that they are inadequate or incapable in some way, often stemming from internalized criticism or past failures. This mindset can significantly affect employee confidence and productivity, as those with a negative self-view may hesitate to take on new challenges or assert their ideas.
